fulltext:
Le Tiet Cuong 
31/08/1993 
OBJECTIVE 
To obtain suitable positions that enable me to apply the knowledge acquired through my 
degree & experience, and to enhance my management skill set, negotiating skills. 
EDUCATION 
HCMC University of Technology HUTECH (Vietnam) – Bachelors of Business Administration 
CERTIFICATIONS & QUALIFICATIONS 
Technical skills: B degree in MS Access (2015) 
• Microsoft Office literate 
Google Adwords Certification (Search, Display, Mobile, 
Languages: B degree in English (2015) 
• English fluency in 4 skills. 
• Vietnamese: native 
EXPERIENCE 
I . 
LONG-TERM 
1. Sales Executive: 
June 2012 – Mar 2014 
LC Art & Trade Co. Ltd. (Vietnam) – Phuong Mai Gallery 
• Representing the company at trade exhibitions, events and demonstrations; 
• Maintaining and developing relationships with existing customers in person and via telephone calls 
and emails 
• Negotiating on the terms of an agreement and closing sales price, delivery and specifications with 
buyers and managers; 
Salary: 
Gross : 250 USD 
Net: 200 USD 
2. Restaurant Operation Supervisor: 
Mar 2014 – Mar 2015 
LC Art & Trade Co. Ltd. (Vietnam) – Phuong Mai Restaurant 
• Ensures that staff and guests adhere to all safety standards and procedures 
• Resolves guest service issues by utilizing strong customer service skills and exercising diplomacy 
in keeping with company objective of customer retention 
• Building training working procedures, working rosters and some related forms. 
Salary  : 
Gross : approx. 400 USD 
Net: approx. 300 USD 
3. Sales Executive: 
Aug 2015 – Dec 2015 
Basic Interior Joint Stock Company (Vietnam) – ADP Architect 
• To lead and manage interior fitting-out projects from inception to completion 
• Responsible for leading the project team to ensure on time project delivery 
• Liaise with client on issues relating to the project 
Salary : 
Gross : approx. 550 USD 
Net: approx. 400 USD 
4. Business Development Manager 
Dec 2015 – April 2016 
Pegasus Trading Management Co. Ltd. (Vietnam) 
• Doing branch office platform setup in Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam. Including but not limited 
to company registration, office rental, renovation, recruitment. 
• Planning business strategy to achieve sales target. 
• Involved in marketing and advertising. Including converting marketing material to Vietnamese, 
providing opinions and suggestions in marketing, advertising. 
• Assist in providing sales training to the sales agents. Control information throughout the 
project period. 
Salary: 
Gross : approx. 600 USD 
Net: 500 USD 
5. Agency Account Manager & Account Strategist (SEM Specialist) 
April 2016 – Mar 2018 
Teledirect Telecommerce Sdn. BHD (Malaysia) – Google Project 
• Leverage data and research in order to generate insights and develop narratives that will unlock 
opportunities for Google and our clients. 
• Acquire and share deep knowledge of the industry/vertical, the competitive landscape, client 
products, and key business issues that affect the client and industry. 
• Monitor and analyze online marketing and campaign performance data in order to 
suggest structural and editorial improvements that will optimize ad campaigns. 
• Encourage advertisers to incorporate Google's various ad strategies to optimize their ROI. 
Provide campaign updates and recommendations, and ensure that our advertisers are satisfied 
with their business growth. 
• Provide customer training and orientation on Google products. Communicate effectively 
with Vietnamese and English speaking clients 
Salary: Gross : approx. 1600 USD 
Net: 900 USD 
6. Senior Business Development (Sales & Marketing) 
Mar 2018 – Dec 2018 
DBplus Creative Interior Design & Build Company (Vietnam) 
• In charge of Marketing related jobs, such as: Facebook, LinkedIn, POSM & planning strategy to 
improve Brand of Business as well as Sales. 
• Acquire and share deep knowledge of the industry/vertical, the competitive landscape, client 
products, and key business issues that affect the client and industry. 
• Managing contents of Facebook Fanpage & Website included: copy writings & photos 
• Exploit business opportunity by finding customers, meet up and introduce about 
company services 
• Leading Design & Build project from the beginning to the end. 
• Managing & assigning specific jobs for Project Team to deliver final result. 
Salary: Gross : approx. 1000 USD 
Net: approx. 850 USD 
7. Business Development Manager (Supply) 
Dec 2018 – May 2019 
OYO Technology & Hospitality Limited Company (Vietnam) 
• In charge of clusters in HCM and Vung Tau city. 
• Acquire and share deep knowledge of the industry/vertical, the competitive landscape, products. 
• Exploit business opportunity by finding customers, meet up and introduce about 
company products & services. 
• Co-pitching with team members to help achieve individual and team’s target 
• Top Performance Member Certificate Achieved. 
Salary: Gross : approx. 1500 USD. 
Net: approx. 1200 US 
II.. PART-TIME&SHORT-TERM 
1. Waiter 
Hotel Continental Saigon 
Aug 2011 – Feb 2012 
2. Bartender Trainee 
May 2012 - June 2012 
Three Broomsticks – Phan Xich Long Branch 
3. Personal Asisstant 
Dec 2015 – January 2016 
Singapore Isource Company 
Aug 2011 – 2015 
• Meeting Potential Business Collaborators on behalf of the Company 
• Survey Investment potential opportunity 
• Being the main coordinator for investors in Singapore 
• Gathering information and reporting to direct manager. 
III.NPO 
1. English Tutor 
At Home 
• Teaching English grammar, speaking, reading and listening skills for 11-15 years old kids. 
• Helping kids solving their homeworks. 
• Helping kids catch up the speed of studying in school. 
• Improving kids’s skills of studying. 
INTEREST 
Travel; Reading; Playing Basketball, Soccer; Swimming; Listening music ( Especially US-UK ) 
REFERENCES 
1. Mr. Nguyen Quang Cuong: CEO of LC Art & Trade Co. Ltd. 
Contact: (+84) 91 831 4000 
2. Ms. Hien Pham : Business Development Manager of Basic Interior Joint Stock Company (ADP). 
Contact: (+84) 93 825 9588 
3. Mr. Johny Nguyen: UMM Project Team Leader (Google Project) of Teledirect Telecommerce 
Sdn BHD. 
Contact: (+60) 16 333 9190
